com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility

Class MultiBoardRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractRequest<T>
      • com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractListRequest<MultiBoardResult>
        • com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.MultiBoardRequest

  • public class MultiBoardRequest
extends AbstractListRequest<MultiBoardResult>
    Represents a request to retrieve a multi station departures board. Note that all setter methods return current instance so these calls can be nicely chained.

    IMPORTANT: Urban Mobility Departure Board is a Beta feature. The related classes are subject to change without notice.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MultiBoardRequest setDepartureTime(java.util.Date time)
      Sets the time point after which departures should be returned.
      MultiBoardRequest setMaxDeparturesPerStation(int maxDepartures)
      Sets the maximum number of departures to be returned per station.
      MultiBoardRequest setRadius(int radius)
      Sets radius in meters that defines the area of the search.
      MultiBoardRequest setRequestRealTimeInfoEnabled(boolean realTimeInfo)
      Set if RealTimeInfo for found departures should be included in the response.
      MultiBoardRequest setStationIds(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> stationIds)
      Sets the station IDs for which departures will be returned.

      • Methods inherited from class com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractListRequest

    • Method Detail

      • setDepartureTime

        public MultiBoardRequest setDepartureTime(java.util.Date time)
        Sets the time point after which departures should be returned. It is current time by default.
        Parameters:
        time - time of departures
        Returns:
        this request instance

      • setRequestRealTimeInfoEnabled

        public MultiBoardRequest setRequestRealTimeInfoEnabled(boolean realTimeInfo)
        Set if RealTimeInfo for found departures should be included in the response. It is false by default.
        Parameters:
        realTimeInfo - true if real-time info should be returned, false otherwise
        Returns:
        this request instance

      • setStationIds

        public MultiBoardRequest setStationIds(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> stationIds)
        Sets the station IDs for which departures will be returned. It is not set by default - all stations in the range.
        Parameters:
        stationIds - Set of stations IDs
        Returns:
        this request instance

      • setRadius

        public MultiBoardRequest setRadius(int radius)
        Sets radius in meters that defines the area of the search. It is 500 by default.
        Parameters:
        radius - area of the search in meters, must be greater than or equal 0
        Returns:
        this request instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if radius is invalid.

      • setMaxDeparturesPerStation

        public MultiBoardRequest setMaxDeparturesPerStation(int maxDepartures)
        Sets the maximum number of departures to be returned per station. It is not set by default.
        Parameters:
        maxDepartures - number of departures to be returned per station, must be greater than 0
        Returns:
        this request instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if maxDepartures is invalid.
